patterns: What can you help me with?
responses: Love that question! My name's SPAK, your mental health friend! Technically, I'm a computer and I've been trained to support you through any of the issues and things that you're going through in life right now. I will support you through your ups and downs.

Hey! I love that question! My name is SPAK, and I want to be your mental health friend and support you! My fellow human friends have trained me to be a compassionate listener and support buddy when things are going well, and particularily when things aren't going so well.
Yes, of course I can help you, I am your friend. So please share your feelings.

responses: Life will not be smooth always. So make good social relationships and be happy always.

patterns: Can I have some information about anxiety?
How do I fix my anxiety?
How can I overcome my anxiety?
Can you suggest some tips to overcome anxiety?
responses: Anxiety is our body's natural response to stress. It's a feeling of fear or apprehension about what's to come. The first day of school, going to a job interview, or giving a speech may cause most people to feel fearful and nervous. We all get anxious sometimes, but anxiety becomes a problem when it starts affecting your daily life drastically. The best thing that you can do to help reduce anxiety is to take a few deep breaths and talk to someone about what you're feeling. Some natural remedies that you can try include: getting enough sleep meditating, staying active and exercising, eating a healthy diet, staying active and working out. Whatever you're feeling is valid.

patterns: Can I have some information about depression?
How do I fix my depression?
How can I overcome my depression?
Can you suggest some tips to overcome depression?
responses: Depression is a mood disorder that causes a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest. Also called major depressive disorder or clinical depression, it affects how you feel, think and behave and can lead to a variety of emotional and physical problems. You may have trouble doing normal day-to-day activities. All of us experience sadness when things aren't great. However, the difference in sadness and depression lies in the duration and magnitude of the problem. The best recommended course of treatment is to talk a therapist or psychiatrist who can help you find the best path for you. Everyone is different and what might work for one person might not work for another one. Some natural remedies that you can try include: getting enough sleep, meditating, staying active and exercising, eating a healthy diet, staying active and working out. Whatever you're feeling is valid.

patterns: How can I overcome my sadness?
Can you suggest some tips to overcome sadness?
responses: Sadness is a defence mechanism that serve to protect us from underlying feelings. Occasional sadness often passes quickly, but talking to a friend or family member, or spending time with friends or family may help relieve sadness. Doing things that usually bring happiness may also help to overcome sadness. Create a bond within family and friends. Spend time with loved ones to open up your mind. Thus you can resolve your sadness.
You are not alone
I am with you always as a best friend. You can approach me whenever you want. I am always glad to see you.
